duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute strategic business development action plans within a prescribed territory to generate revenue growth and expand the client base.
Maintain client relationship management at key accounts through the account development cycle to ensure client satisfaction and loyalty.
Identify and initiate contact with decision-makers, securing initial client visits and converting prospects into new clients.
Maintain confidential and accurate client information in the Customer Relationship Management System (CRM) and prepare sales reports as directed.
Represent the company at industry-related functions, networking events, and maintain a high level of confidentiality with regards to all internal and external matters.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
